title: "NIL Store web scraping exercise"
output: html_document
date: "2024-06-07"
---




```{r}

# Install and load the rvest package
install.packages("rvest")
library(rvest)

# Example HTML snippet
html <- '<li class="only_link">
            <a class="color-text" href="https://arkansas.nil.store/">
                <img width="20" height="auto" src="//nil.store/cdn/shop/files/Arkansas.png?v=1704157843"> Arkansas
            </a>
         </li>'

# Parse the HTML
page <- read_html(html)

# Extract the URLs
schools <- page %>%
  html_nodes("li.only_link a.color-text") %>%
  html_attr("href")

# Print the URLs
print(schools)
